extendedInfo.description: Weapons: M4A1, AK47, 9mm, Revolver, Uzi, Chainsaw, Knife, and Banana!âââ Want the Ad Free version? Check out the $0.99 version of GunApp 3D!! âââTurn your Phone into a toy gun! Realistically modeled animations put you in control of the ultimate 3D gun simulator.Have fun with your friends in a mock fire-fight, play Russian Roulette to settle disputes, use a banana the way you have always wanted to - as a FEARSOME WEAPON of LETHALITY, or turn your Phone into a chainsaw that can cut absolutely ANYTHING in HALF!! (virtually, of course)ALL IN FULL 3D!!With GunApp3D you can:â Choose from 10+ backgrounds to suit your tasteâ Take screenshots of your favorite combinations to set as your Phone's wallpaperâ Realistically interact with a 9mm pistol (reload, fire, and manual slide control)â Encrust your gold plated 9mm ghetto blaster with your initials (in diamonds)â Play Russian Roulette with a .357 revolverâ Snipe your pals (or boss) using a removable silencerâ Use a banana as a semi-automatic weaponâ Turn your Phone into a chainsawA lot went into this app to make it as interesting as possible to gun enthusiasts. Suggestions/Feedback are always welcome. Send e-mails to felix@mobiledevgroup.com

reviews.comment: Awsome,could have more guns but great app,sounds great.I def recemend it to people that likes guns and playing around.GREAT APP

reviews.title: Best gun app
reviews.comment: This is probably the best gun app I have ever seen on android, but the app lacks alot of guns. Please add some sniper rifles like the infamous AS-50.

reviews.title: The Best Gun App Ever
reviews.comment: I have never installed a better gun app in my entire time ive had my phone. Its great, and I love the animations. Add more guns, and I will end up paying for this.
